addon.name: TVCatchup
addon.provider-name: dj_gerbil and the guys at TVC

extension.description: This plugin allows UK users to view free-to-air channels on XBMC courtesy of TVCatchup.com
extension.disclaimer: This plugin is provided as is. Although all attempts will be made to help resolve issues, no promises can be made. Please note: You must hold a valid TV Licence and be within the UK Borders to use this plugin. Use of VPN's to attempt to bypass geo-blocking is not allowed and will be blocked. By using this plugin you are agreeing to the sites terms of service. A copy o thse can be found in License.txt
